title: 'Extraordinary discovery:' Remains of nine Neanderthals found in Italian cave; they were likely killed and eaten by hyenas
content:
1. 'Extraordinary discovery:' Remains of nine Neanderthals found in Italian cave; they were likely killed and eaten by hyenas  USA TODAY
  2. 'Extraordinary Discovery': Archaeologists Find Neanderthal Remains In Cave Near Rome  NPR
  3. 100000-Year-Old Neanderthal Remains Discovered in Cave  Inside Edition
  4. Extraordinary Fossils Of 9 Neanderthals Discovered In Cave Outside Rome  HuffPost
  5. By eating them, hyenas gathered 9 Neanderthal skeletons in one cave  Ars Technica
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
